name: Ext_R5_Library_content
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Library.content for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Library.content from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Library|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Contents of the library, either embedded or referenced
element.definition: The content of the library as an Attachment. The content may be a reference to a url, or may be directly embedded as a base-64 string. Either way, the contentType of the attachment determines how to interpret the content.
element.comment: `Library.content` maps to R4 `Library.content`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
